text_block_list.text: For some time after the Selection Race, Daiwa Scarlet was surrounded by trainers looking to scout her.
But now…

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Wait, is no one really going to approach Scarlet with an offer?

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I've decided to just focus my efforts on Vodka. No matter how 
great Daiwa Scarlet is on the field, it'd be hard for anyone to 
take her to the next level with that temper of hers…

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Well, you're not exactly wrong. 
I guess I'll give scouting Vodka a shot too.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Hmph, good riddance! Now that the crowd that's been following me 
is gone, I can finally focus on training-

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
…is what I've been wanting to say, but… 
You! Why are you still here!?
choice_data_list: I wanted to talk to you.
I wanted to talk to you.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Huh?…Oh, could it be that you still think 
I'm some sort of obedient honor student?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Well, I might as well say it at this point. 
That's just me pretending.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
This is the real me. 
…Like those guys said, I'm a selfish, stubborn pain in the ass.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Let me guess, not what you expected? 
It's fine, you can go away now.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …Wait. Didn't you hear what I just said?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I'm not who you think I am! 
Why don't you get it already!?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
There's so many other fast horse girls in Tracen Academy! 
I'm just some poser who acts big and got humiliated!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
You're so persistent. 
I never asked for you to console me!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Even I'm not that clueless… I get it. I know that me saying 
"I'm number one" over and over was just a bunch of empty words!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Just because I lost to Vodka once, I got depressed 
and started doing long training runs out of desperation… 
Even I know I was being stupid!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
But what else could I have done!? 
I couldn't forgive myself unless I was number one!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
The fastest, strongest, most popular horse girl around… 
I hate being anything other than that kind of number one.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I couldn't be satisfied with myself unless I was exactly that… 
That's just how I am, so that was the only way I could react…!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: For my own sake, I can't stop trying to be number one!
choice_data_list: I came here because of that, to support you.
I came here because of that, to support you.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …Huh?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Wait. Even after hearing all that… 
Are you genuinely stupid?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Take the hint already! I'm just a stubborn kid who 
only ever obsesses over being number one!!
choice_data_list: Then let's aim for that number one together.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I told you no already!! 
Why are you still talking like you're going to scout me!?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Just so you know, 
I'm not going to be some obedient girl who just listens to you!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Also, I'm going to complain a lot if I don't like 
your training plan! Can you handle that!?
choice_data_list: Then we'll discuss and adjust it until you like it!
Then we'll discuss and adjust it until you like it!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …W-What's your problem?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
You want to support me? You want to 
do this together? Are you serious?
choice_data_list: I'm the "number one" trainer for you.
I'm the "number one" trainer for you.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
…Hmph. 
"Number one" is my thing, don't copy me.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Seriously… Why am I stuck with such a weird guy like you…

As if all that she's been bottling up inside in started 
overflowing, Daiwa Scarlet started crying.
And after some time has passed…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …How long has it been since I cried in front of anybody?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Sigh… I lost my motivation to train. …I'll just go home.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
To be honest, my body's been feeling pretty heavy lately. 
I think… I'll go to bed early for once.

I could no longer feel the same drive for victory from Daiwa 
Scarlet as she was leaving. It seems like her placement in the 
Selection Race was still weighing on her mind.

As I was wondering if I could do anything to help regain her 
confidence, I happened to overhear something in the cafe…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Heya, Vodka!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh?…Oh, it's just you, Teio.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
What do you mean "just you"!? 
…Vodka, you're no fun these days.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: It's nothing… Really.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
It's just… she keeps having that 
disappointed look on her face…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
"She?" Oh, you mean Scarlet? She's not just your roommate but 
your rival as well, of course you'd be worried about her!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: N-no, man… It's not that…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
But yeah, she does look pretty down. Did losing to you in the 
Selection Race really bum her out that bad?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
…I never thought she was the kind to 
let that sort of thing get her down.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Vodka…?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Tch, whatever man. I just can't imagine myself losing to her if 
she's being like that. That's all.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ahh, hey! Vodka, wait up!!
―I think I just came up with a good idea.
